name: panora
tagline: A unified inbox platform for customer support teams
description: Panora is a self-hosted unified inbox for customer support teams. It supports email and API-based integrations for consolidating and responding to support tickets and requests.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Consolidate support tickets from multiple channels including email, chat, and API integrations into single interface

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize, prioritize, and assign support requests with status tracking, tags, and custom workflows

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Internal notes, mentions, and ticket assignments enable seamless coordination among support members

features.title: Api Integrations
features.description: Connect with external tools and services through API endpoints to extend functionality and automate workflows

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Quickly find specific tickets using powerful search and filtering by status, assignee, date, or custom
